SourceText: ParentText is easiest to use when you receive content as videos, images and text. However, your data bundle and bandwidth may not support videos. To save on data, you can choose to receive the same content with a smaller audio file or as text. How would you like to receive ParentText?
text: ParentText is die maklikste om te gebruik wanneer jy inhoud as video's, prente en teks ontvang. Jou databondel en bandwydte kan egter dalk nie video's ondersteun nie. Om data te bespaar, kan jy kies om dieselfde inhoud met 'n kleiner oudiolêer of as teks te ontvang. Hoe wil jy graag ParentText ontvang?

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
text: Jammer, ek verstaan nie wat jy bedoel nie.

SourceText: Are you a WOMAN or MAN?
Is @fields.child_nickname a girl or a boy?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Is your child a girl or a boy?
text: Is jou kind 'n meisie of 'n seun?

SourceText: Which province do you live in?
Please provide us with your child's first name.
text: Verskaf asseblief jou kind se naam.

SourceText: Please type "N" if you prefer not to answer.
text: Tik asseblief "N" as jy verkies om nie te antwoord nie.

SourceText: How should we print your name on the certificate?
text: Hoe moet ons jou naam op die sertifikaat druk?

SourceText: ✅Your personal information is safe and private. Your name and information will not be public, but your responses will be kept and could be used by researchers to learn how to support families like yours.
text: Jou persoonlike inligting is veilig en privaat. Jou naam en inligting sal nie openbaar gemaak word nie, maar jou antwoorde sal gehou en deur navorsers gebruik word om vas te stel hoe om gesinne soos joune te ondersteun.

SourceText: ❌You can stop when you want. Just type {STOP}
text: ❌Jy kan stop wanneer jy wil. Tik net {STOP}

SourceText: Press YES if you agree with this. Type "EXIT" if you do not want to participate.
text: Tik JA as jy hiermee saamstem. Tik GAAN UIT as jy nie wil deelneem nie.

SourceText: That is wonderful, thank you so much!
Can you please confirm that you are 16 years old or older?
text: Kan jy asseblief bevestig dat jy 16 jaar of ouer is?

SourceText: Are you sure you do not want to get these messages? If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type NO. If you made a mistake, please press BACK and choose another option.
text: Is jy seker jy wil nie hierdie boodskappe ontvang nie? As jy nie meer enige boodskappe wil ontvang nie, tik asseblief NEE. As jy 'n fout gemaak het, druk asseblief TERUG en kies 'n ander opsie.

SourceText: If you ever return to participate in the programme, type "HELLO".
text: Indien jy ooit weer terugkom om aan die program deel te neem, tik HALLO.

SourceText: We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!
text: Ons hoop ons sien jou gou weer, en ons hoop jy het 'n lekker en rustige dag!

SourceText: Sorry, ParentText is only for people over the age of 16. Do you confirm that you are under the age of 16?
text: Jammer, ParentText is slegs vir mense ouer as 16 jaar. Bevestig jy dat jy onder die ouderdom van 16 is?

SourceText: If you want to experience ParentText, you can always share it with your parents or caregivers.
text: As jy graag deel wil wees van ParentText, kan jy dit altyd na jou ouers of versorgers toe aanstuur.

SourceText: Here is a video that shows how to use ParentText.
text: Hier is 'n video wat wys hoe om ParentText te gebruik.

SourceText: When was @fields.child_nickname born? Enter their date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Wanneer is @fields.child_nickname gebore? Tik sy/haar geboortedatum in die volgende formaat: DD/MM/JJJJ. Byvoorbeeld, As jou kind op 19 Mei 2010 gebore is, tik 19/05/2010.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: When was your child born? Enter their date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Wanneer is jou kind gebore? Tik sy/haar geboortedatum in die volgende formaat: DD/MM/JJJJ. Byvoorbeeld, As jou kind op 19 Mei 2010 gebore is, tik 19/05/2010.

SourceText: Sorry, this date is invalid. Please provide your child's date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Jammer, hierdie datum is ongeldig. Verskaf asseblief jou kind se geboortedatum in die volgende formaat: DD/MM/JJJJ. Byvoorbeeld, as jou kind op 19 Mei 2010 gebore is, tik 19/05/2010.

SourceText: The date you entered is in the future. Please provide your child's date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Die datum wat jy ingevul het, is in die toekoms. Verskaf asseblief jou kind se geboortedatum in die volgende formaat: DD/MM/JJJJ. Byvoorbeeld, as jou kind op 19 Mei 2010 gebore is, tik 19/05/2010.

SourceText: Let's try again. Please provide your child's date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Kom ons probeer weer. Verskaf asseblief jou kind se geboortedatum in die volgende formaat: DD/MM/JJJJ. Byvoorbeeld, as jou kind op 19 Mei 2010 gebore is, tik 19/05/2010.

SourceText: @fields.child_nickname is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. Is that correct?
text: @fields.child_nickname is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) jaar oud. Is dit korrek?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Your child is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. Is that correct?
text: Jou kind is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) jaar oud. Is dit korrek?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: @fields.child_nickname is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old.  Is that correct?
text: @fields.child_nickname is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) jaar oud. Is dit korrek?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Your teen is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old.  Is that correct?
text: Jou tiener is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) jaar oud. Is dit korrek?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: According to the date you provided, @fields.child_nickname would be @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. ParentText is only for children aged 2-17. Please enter a valid date for your child's birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Volgens die datum wat jy verskaf het, is @fields.child_nickname @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) jaar oud. ParentText is slegs vir kinders van 2-17 jaar oud. Vul asseblief 'n geldige geboortedatum in die volgende formaat in: DD/MM/JJJJ. Byvoorbeeld, as jou kind op 19 Mei 2010 gebore is, tik 19/05/2010.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: According to the date you provided, your child would be @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. ParentText is only for children aged 2-17. Please enter a valid date for your child's birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Volgens die datum wat jy verskaf het, is jou kind @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) jaar oud. ParentText is slegs vir kinders van 2-17 jaar oud. Vul asseblief 'n geldige geboortedatum in die volgende formaat in: DD/MM/JJJJ. Byvoorbeeld, As jou kind op 19 Mei 2010 gebore is, tik 19/05/2010.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Welcome to ParentText! This chatbot has been designed with and for parents just like you. We hope you find it useful!
text: Welkom by ParentText! Hierdie geselsbot is saam met en vir ouers soos jy ontwerp. Ons hoop jy vind dit nuttig!

SourceText: ParentText will help you with all of the children in your life, but in this programme, we are focusing on just one child at a time.
text: ParentText sal jou help met al die kinders in jou lewe, maar in hierdie program fokus ons op slegs een kind op 'n keer.

SourceText: Would you like to go back to the previous messages?
text: Wil jy teruggaan na die vorige boodskappe toe?

SourceText: That's okay. Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines.
text: Dis oukei. Tik enige tyd {HELP} as jy die besonderhede van nooddienste of ander blitslyne wil hê.

SourceText: Here are the contact details of your local emergency services:
text: Hier is die kontakbesonderhede van jou plaaslike nooddienste:

SourceText: Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines. Remember everything you say will be completely private!
text: Tik enige tyd {HELP} as jy die besonderhede van nooddienste of ander blitslyne wil hê. Onthou, alles wat jy sê, is heeltemal privaat!

SourceText: If you ever feel like talking privately to a trained professional, you can call:
text: As jy ooit privaat met 'n opgeleide professionele persoon wil praat, skakel:

SourceText: Here are the contact details of your local medical services:
text: Hier is die kontakbesonderhede van jou plaaslike mediese dienste:

SourceText: Are you currently facing an emergency?
Do you need some support with an emotional issue?
text: Het jy ondersteuning nodig vir 'n emosionele probleem?

SourceText: Are you currently experiencing a health issue?
Are you experiencing an unsafe situation?
text: Verkeer jy tans in 'n onveilige situasie?

SourceText: Do you need some urgent help?

text: Ek verstaan nie jou boodskap nie.

SourceText: Please type {MENU} to access resources and review completed modules, {PLAY} to receive a playful activity you can complete with your child, or {HELP} to access local support resources for a crisis.
text: Tik asseblief {MENU} om toegang tot hulpbronne te verkry en voltooide modules te hersien, {PLAY} om 'n speel-aktiwiteit te ontvang wat jy saam met jou kind kan voltooi, of {HELP} om toegang te kry tot plaaslike ondersteuningsdienste in 'n krisis.

SourceText: You have not given consent to participate in this programme. Would you like to participate?
text: Jy het nie toestemming gegee om aan hierdie program deel te neem nie. Wil jy graag deelneem?

SourceText: If you ever decide to participate in the programme, type HELLO.
text: As jy ooit besluit om aan die program deel te neem, tik HALLO.

SourceText: Parenting is hard. ParentText may help. Would you like to continue your progress?
text: Ouerskap is moeilik. ParentText kan help. Wil jy graag jou vordering voortsit?

SourceText: That's okay. If you ever decide to come back, type HELLO.
text: Dis oukei. As jy ooit besluit om terug te kom, tik HALLO.

SourceText: You are already part of ParentText!
text: Jy is alreeds deel van ParentText!

SourceText: Staying in ParentText helps you and your child. Are you sure you want to exit the programme?
text: Deur in ParentText te bly, help jou en jou kind. Is jy seker jy wil die program verlaat?

SourceText: If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type "EXIT".
text: As jy nie meer enige boodskappe wil ontvang nie, tik asseblief "GAAN UIT".

SourceText: If you made a mistake, please type "BACK".
text: As jy 'n fout gemaak het, tik asseblief "TERUG".

SourceText: Thank you for participating. If you want to return to the programme, type HELLO.
text: Dankie vir jou deelname. As jy wil terugkeer na die program, tik HALLO.

SourceText: We hope to see you again soon!
text: Ons hoop om jou gou weer te sien!

SourceText: We are so glad you want to stick around! We will resume your progress tomorrow.
text: Ons is so bly jy wil aanhou! Ons sal jou vordering môre weer begin.

SourceText: This feature will be available once you have completed registration. It won’t take long. Please continue your progress!
text: Hierdie kenmerk sal beskikbaar wees sodra jy registrasie voltooi het. Dit sal nie lank neem nie. Sit asseblief jou vordering voort!

SourceText: The menu will be available once you have completed registration. It won’t take long. Please continue your progress!
text: Die kieslys sal beskikbaar wees sodra jy registrasie voltooi het. Dit sal nie lank neem nie. Sit asseblief jou vordering voort!

SourceText: In this course, you will complete @fields.c_n_mod lessons. You will receive a new lesson each day. Your first lesson is @results.name.
text: In hierdie kursus sal jy @fields.c_n_mod lesse voltooi. Jy sal elke dag 'n nuwe les ontvang. Jou eerste les is @results.name.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You have completed @fields.c_n_mod_compl out of @fields.c_n_mod lessons in this course. Today's lesson is @results.name.
text: Jy het @fields.c_n_mod_compl uit @fields.c_n_mod lesse in hierdie kursus voltooi. Vandag se les is @results.name.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Let’s get started. Press NEXT to begin.
text: Kom ons begin. Druk VOLGENDE om te begin.

SourceText: Well done. You're ready to start the programme.
text: Welgedaan. Jy is gereed om met die program te begin.

SourceText: You only have the following lesson to complete:
text: Jy het slegs die volgende les om te voltooi:

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Which lesson would you like to complete?
text: Watter les sal jy graag wil voltooi?

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You haven't started to work on a course yet.
text: Jy het nog nie aan 'n kursus begin werk nie.

SourceText: You have only started the course
text: Jy het slegs die kursus begin

SourceText: Would you like support on it?
text: Wil jy graag ondersteuning daarmee hê?

SourceText: That's okay. You can access more information at any time in the Main Menu. Just type {MENU}.
text: Dis oukei. Jy kan enige tyd meer inligting in die Hoofkieslys kry. Tik net {MENU}.

SourceText: You haven't completed a lesson yet.
text: Jy het nog nie 'n les voltooi nie.

SourceText: Which course do you want to review?

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.count is a number (counter for list)

SourceText: You haven't completed any of the lessons in this course.
text: Jy het nog nie enige van die lesse in hierdie kursus voltooi nie.

SourceText: You have only completed the following lesson:
text: Jy het nog net die volgende les voltooi:

SourceText: Would you like to review it?
That's okay. You can come back here at any time to review it.
text: Dis oukei. Jy kan enige tyd hierheen terugkom om dit te hersien.

SourceText: You have completed @fields.n_s_modules_compl lessons within this course. Which lesson do you want to review?
text: Jy het @fields.n_s_modules_compl lesse in hierdie kursus voltooi. Watter les wil jy hersien?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.
Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.count is a number (counter for list)

text: Kom ons begin met die kursus

SourceText: Which course would you like to complete next?
text: Watter les sal jy graag volgende wil doen?

SourceText: What would you like to do next?
text: Wat wil jy graag volgende doen?

SourceText: What would you like to do?
Do you want to begin now or tomorrow?
text: Wil jy nou begin, of môre?

SourceText: It takes only 5 days to complete this first course and earn your parenting certificate.
text: Dit neem slegs 5 dae om hierdie eerste kursus te voltooi en jou ouerskapsertifikaat te verwerf.

SourceText: 🎉You did it!🎉 You have completed the course @results.name. Here's your course certificate. Congratulations!
text: 🎉Jy het dit gedoen! 🎉Jy het die kursus @results.name voltooi. Hier is jou kursussertifikaat. Baie geluk!
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Remember, you can always return to ParentText and get extra support or review this information. Just type {MENU}.
text: Onthou, jy kan altyd terugkom na ParentText en ekstra ondersteuning kry of hierdie inligting hersien. Tik net {MENU}.

SourceText: ParentText has begun. You are just 5 days away from earning your parenting certificate. Are you ready to complete your registration and get started?
text: ParentText het begin. Jy is net 5 dae daarvan weg om jou ouerskapsertifikaat te verwerf. Is jy gereed om jou registrasie te voltooi en te begin?

SourceText: Select one of the options below:
text: Kies een van die opsies hieronder:

SourceText: It seems like you've got some catching up to do! Do you want to complete your previous unfinished lesson or start a new lesson?
text: Dit lyk of jy 'n bietjie moet inhaal! Wil jy jou vorige onvoltooide les voltooi of 'n nuwe les begin?

SourceText: Do you want to catch up and proceed to the next lesson?
text: Wil jy inhaal en na die volgende les aangaan?

SourceText: You're almost finished with this course! You only have 1 unfinished lesson. What would you like to do?
text: Jy's amper klaar met hierdie kursus! Jy het net 1 onvoltooide les. Wat wil jy graag doen?

SourceText: Press a number on your keypad:
1. Finish this lesson and earn my course certificate
text: 1. Voltooi hierdie les en verdien my kursussertifikaat

SourceText: You're almost finished with this course! You have @fields.c_n_mod_started unfinished lessons. What would you like to do?
text: Jy's amper klaar met hierdie kursus! Jy het @fields.c_n_mod_started onvoltooide lesse. Wat wil jy graag doen?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 1. Complete unfinished lessons to earn my course certificate
text: 1. Voltooi onvoltooide lesse om my kursussertifikaat te verdien

SourceText: It’s time to get started on your course, @results.name. Are you ready?
text: Dis tyd om met jou kursus te begin, @results.name. Is jy gereed?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: We've got another lesson ready for you! Are you ready?
text: Ons het nog 'n les gereed vir jou! Is jy gereed?

SourceText: We hope this was helpful! You can access the Main Menu at any time by typing {MENU}.
text: Ons hoop dit het jou gehelp! Jy kan enige tyd toegang tot die Hoofkieslys kry deur {MENU} te tik.

SourceText: To invite someone to join, share this link!
text: Om iemand te nooi om aan te sluit, deel hierdie skakel!

SourceText: You have reached the end of this lesson! 🎉
text: Jy het die einde van hierdie les bereik! 🎉

SourceText: What do you want to do next?
That's okay. You can access more information at any time in the Main Menu.
text: Dis oukei. Jy kan enige tyd meer inligting in die Hoofkieslys kry.

SourceText: 🎉You did it! Congratulations!🎉 You have completed all the available courses. Well done!
text: 🎉Jy het dit gedoen! Veels geluk!🎉Jy het al die beskikbare kursusse voltooi. Welgedaan!

SourceText: You have completed @fields.c_n_mod_compl out of @fields.c_n_mod lessons.
text: Jy het @fields.c_n_mod_compl uit die @fields.c_n_mod lesse voltooi.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.
Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You are currently working on the course @results.name.
text: Jy werk tans aan die kursus @results.name.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Your current media setting is Text, Images, and Videos.
text: Jou huidige media-instelling is Teks, Prente en Video's.

SourceText: Your current media setting is Text, Images, and Audio.
text: Jou huidige media-instelling is Teks, Prente en Oudio.

SourceText: Your current media setting is Text and Images Only.
text: Jou huidige media-instelling is Slegs Teks en Prente.
Jy het nie hierdie inligting verskaf nie.

SourceText: Would you like to change it?

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You completed the ParentText demo. Type {RESET} and then {FACSTART} to re-start from the beginning.
text: Jy het die ParentText-demo voltooi. Tik {RESET} en dan {FACSTART} om weer van die begin af te begin.

SourceText: It looks like ParentText isn't working for you. Can you tell us why?
text: Dit lyk asof ParentText nie vir jou werk nie. Kan jy vir ons sê hoekom?

SourceText: ParentText should only take 10 minutes a day to complete. Would you like to try a new lesson now?
text: ParentText behoort net 10 minute per dag te neem om te voltooi. Wil jy nou 'n nuwe les probeer?

SourceText: Oh no! Why is ParentText not helpful?
text: O nee! Hoekom is ParentText nie nuttig nie?

SourceText: It may seem like spending one-on-one time with your child won't help you with their behaviour right away, but patience is key. This time together helps you understand each other better and build a strong bond. When children feel heard and supported like this, it often helps improve their behaviour over time.
text: Dit mag lyk of dit nie dadelik jou kind se gedrag sal verbeter om een-tot-een tyd saam hulle deur te bring nie, maar geduld is die sleutel. Hierdie tyd saam help julle om mekaar beter te verstaan en 'n sterk band op te bou. Wanneer kinders sulke ondersteuning en aandag voel, help dit dikwels om hulle gedrag oor tyd te verbeter.

SourceText: Would you like to try a new lesson now to learn more about one-on-one time?
text: Wil jy nou 'n nuwe les probeer om meer oor een-tot-een tyd te leer?

SourceText: I might know some resources that can help.
text: Ek mag dalk van hulpbronne weet wat kan help.

SourceText: Feeling sad, stressed, or having trouble with your child's behaviour? 😟 These places can help: 💡
text: Voel jy hartseer, gestres, of het jy probleme met jou kind se gedrag? 😟 Hierdie plekke kan help: 💡

SourceText: Take care of yourself! 😊 Your local clinic is here to help with any health problems. If you need extra support, here are some free helplines: ☎️
text: Sorg vir jouself! 😊 Jou plaaslike kliniek is hier om te help met enige gesondheidsprobleme. As jy ekstra ondersteuning nodig het, is hier 'n paar gratis hulplyne: ☎️

SourceText: Seeing or going through violence can be scary and confusing. 😔 But there are people who can help you and your child! 💕
text: Om geweld te sien of deur geweld te gaan kan vreesaanjaend en verwarrend wees. 😔 Maar daar is mense wat jou en jou kind kan help! 💕

SourceText: A lot of our energy goes into helping the person struggling with substance abuse. While that’s important, you and your family need support too! 💖 Find help for everyone below: ⬇️
text: So baie van ons energie gaan na die persoon wat sukkel met dwelmmisbruik. Terwyl dit belangrik is, het jy en die res van die gesin ook ondersteuning nodig! 💖Vind ondersteuning vir almal hieronder: ⬇️

SourceText: Family life can be tough! 😣 Did you know that social workers at your local Department of Social Development can help with parenting skills, fatherhood, teenage pregnancy, and family or relationship counselling? If there isn’t a DSD office near you, NGOs in your area offer this support too. 🌍
text: Familielewe kan moeilik wees! 😣Het jy geweet dat die maatskaplike werkers by jou plaaslike Departement van Maatskaplike Ontwikkeling kan help met ouerskapvaardighede, vaderskap, tiener swangerskap en gesins- en verhoudingsberading? As jy nie 'n DSD-kantoor naby jou het nie, sal hierdie ondersteuning deur NGO's in jou area aangebied word. 🌍

SourceText: Legal and SASSA issues can be stressful and confusing! 😵 There may be more support available than you realise at the organisations below: 👇
text: Wetlike en SASSA-kwessies kan stresvol en verwarrend wees! 😵Daar mag meer ondersteuning wees as wat jy besef by die onderstaande organisasies: 👇

SourceText: Understanding sexual and gender development can be confusing and hard to talk about. 🌈 We’re all unique! Here’s some support and guidance: 💡
text: Om seksuele en geslagsontwikkeling te verstaan, kan verwarrend en moeilik wees om oor te praat. 🌈Ons is almal uniek! Hier is 'n ondersteuning en leiding: 💡

SourceText: School is where your child spends most of their time. 🏫 Making sure they are in school, happy, and supported is really important. If you're having trouble with any school issues, here’s some help: 📚
text: Skool is waar jou kind die meeste van hulle tyd spandeer. 🏫Dit is so belangrik om seker te maak dat hulle in die skool is, gelukkig is en ondersteun word. Hier is 'n paar hulpbronne as jy sukkel met enige skoolkwessies: 📚

SourceText: I’m sorry that I cannot help with your challenge. If you want to access this information again, you can type {HELP} at any time.
text: Ek is jammer dat ek nie met jou uitdaging kan help nie. As jy hierdie inligting weer wil kry, kan jy op enige tydstip {HELP} tik.

SourceText: I hope this was helpful! You can access this information at any time by typing {HELP}.
text: Ek hoop dit was nuttig! Jy kan enige tyd toegang tot hierdie inligting kry deur {HELP} te tik.

SourceText: If you are facing challenges that are making it more difficult to focus on parenting, I have some resources that can help.
text: As jy uitdagings ervaar wat dit moeiliker maak om op ouerskap te fokus, het ek 'n paar hulpbronne wat kan help.

SourceText: Thank you for letting us know.
text: Dankie dat jy ons laat weet het.

SourceText: That’s okay. These skills are hard at first. I encourage you to complete ParentText. If you still want more support, here are some parenting resources available:
text: Dis reg. Hierdie vaardighede is aanvanklik moeilik. Ek moedig jou aan om ParentText te voltooi. As jy steeds meer ondersteuning wil hê, is hier 'n paar ouerskap-hulpbronne wat beskikbaar is:

SourceText: I hope this was helpful. See you tomorrow
text: Ek hoop dit was nuttig. Sien jou môre

SourceText: Caring for a child with disabilities is challenging. Keep trying and remember to take care of yourself. Here are additional parenting resources for parents of children with special needs:
text: Om 'n kind met gestremdhede te versorg is uitdagend. Hou aan probeer en onthou om vir jouself te sorg. Hier is addisionele ouerskaphulpbronne vir ouers van kinders met spesiale behoeftes:

SourceText: It’s great that you already know so much about parenting. More courses are released on ParentText all of the time. I will let you know when new ones are available. If you want to learn more now, you can join an in-person parenting programme near you:
text: Dis wonderlik dat jy al so baie oor ouerskap weet. Meer kursusse word deurlopend op ParentText vrygestel. Ek sal jou laat weet wanneer nuwes beskikbaar is. As jy nou meer wil leer, kan jy by 'n in-persoon ouerskapprogram naby jou aansluit:

SourceText: Caring for a child with disabilities is challenging. Keep trying and remember to take care of yourself.
text: Om 'n kind met gestremdhede te versorg is uitdagend. Hou aan probeer en onthou om ook vir jouself te sorg.

SourceText: Here are additional parenting resources for parents of children with special needs:
text: Hier is addisionele ouerskaphulpbronne vir ouers van kinders met spesiale behoeftes:

SourceText: I am sorry to hear that ParentText is not working on your phone. Here are a few steps you can try:
text: Ek is jammer om te hoor dat ParentText nie op jou foon werk nie. Hier is 'n paar stappe wat jy kan probeer:

SourceText: 1. Ensure you have the latest version of WhatsApp installed on your phone.
text: 1. Maak seker dat jy die nuutste weergawe van WhatsApp op jou foon geïnstalleer het.

SourceText: 2. Check your internet connection to make sure it's stable.
text: 2. Kyk na jou internetverbinding om seker te maak dit is stabiel.

SourceText: We're here to listen. Please tell how to make ParentText more helpful by sharing your feedback in a single message.
text: Ons is hier om na jou te luister. Deel asseblief jou terugvoer in een boodskap om ParentText meer nuttig te maak.

SourceText: Thank you for sharing your feedback.
text: Dankie dat jy jou terugvoer gedeel het.

SourceText: Type 1 to resume the programme when you are ready!
text: Tik 1 om die program voort te sit wanneer jy gereed is!

SourceText: 🎉You did it!🎉Congratulations for completing your first course!
text: 🎉Jy het dit gedoen! 🎉Geluk met die voltooiing van jou eerste les!

SourceText: The name you would like to have on your completion certificate is @fields.certificate_name. Is that correct?
text: Die naam wat jy op jou voltooiingsertifikaat wil hê is @fields.certificate_name. Is dit reg?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.
